name: Bip Bop's Mart
description:
Visit Big Bop's Mart, an assorted items mart set in the suburbs, bathed in golden light in the golden hour before sunset. 

It is a point and click game that will help you relax for the short time you play. 

This is a project I made for uni,  and plan to continue developing!

CONTROLS

Left mouse button - interact 

Escape - open menu

RESOURCES USED

Music:  David Chen 

Smolshop3.mp3 https://twitter.com/daviddchen
